select cl.logId,cl.content,cl.logTime,cl.customerId,cl.delFlag,c.account,c.customerName from client_log cl,customer c where cl.customerId = c.customerId
cl.logTime >= #params.startTime:datetime#
cl.logTime <= #params.endTime:datetime#
cl.delFlag = #params.delFlag#
cl.content like CONCAT ('%',#params.content#,'%')
order by logTime DESC limit #startRow#,#pageSize#

cl.content like CONCAT ('%',#params.content#,'%')
